attributes.action: Police should patrol all towns and cities to reduce crime
attributes.additional_details: People have been warned to keep their eyes out because of stabbings, so if police patrol towns and cities we won’t need to be as worried because we will feel a lot safer
attributes.background: So many crimes are taking place and police are not in the right place at the right time. Therefore I believe that is this action is to take place we will be able to reduce crime as a country
